english.segment2: Worship worship. For Your love it leads me to the place where I can. Worship worship. For Your love it leads me to that place
english.segment4: Jesus there is no one like You. In all the heavens and this earth. By Your Word all creation it holds. To You I won't let go. Jesus in Your being here. There's a glory to behold. For Your love it leads me. To the place where I can
english.segment6: How can I fathom the depths of Your love. How can I fathom the depths of Your grace
english.segment10: Worship worship. For Your love it leads me to the place where I can. Worship worship. For Your love it leads me to the place where I can. Worship worship. For Your love it leads me to the place where I can. Worship worship
